Item ID42

Mithril arrowtips are made with a mithril bar requiring 55 Smithing, yielding 50 Smithing experience and 15 mithril arrowtips. They are made into mithril arrows when used with headless arrows, requiring 45 Fletching, yielding 112.5 experience per 15 arrows.

They are purchased for 16 coins at the ranging shops: Hickton's Archery Emporium in Catherby, Dargaud's Bow and Arrows in the Ranging Guild, Gulluck and Sons on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] of the Grand Tree, and Void Knight Archery Store at the Void Knights' Outpost. They are purchased for 24 coins at the Armoury in the Combat Training Camp.

[[File:Mithril arrowtips detail.png|left|130x200px]]
'''Mithril arrowtips''' are made with a [[mithril bar]] requiring 55 [[Smithing]], yielding 50 Smithing [[experience]] and 15 mithril arrowtips. They are made into [[mithril arrow]]s when used with [[headless arrow]]s, requiring 45 [[Fletching]], yielding 112.5 experience per 15 arrows. 

They are purchased for {{NoCoins|16}} coins at the ranging shops: [[Hickton's Archery Emporium]] in [[Catherby]], [[Dargaud's Bow and Arrows]] in the [[Ranging Guild]], [[Gulluck and Sons]] on the {{FloorNumber|uk=2}} of the [[Grand Tree]], and [[Void Knight Archery Store]] at the [[Void Knights' Outpost]]. They are purchased for {{NoCoins|24}} coins at the [[Armoury]] in the [[Combat Training Camp]].
